amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report evaluating force structure and military construction requirements in Europe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3914 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3914 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2869; text: CR S2869) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report evaluating force structure and military construction requirements in Europe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3914 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3914 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 3896.
